title: Megane-Kun O Suki Sugiru Do S No Sawamura-San
alternative_title: メガネ君を好きすぎるドSの沢村さん ; Megane-kun wo Suki Sugiru Do S no Sawamura-san ; Sadist Sawamura-san Likes Glasses-kun a Bit Too Much
status: メガネ君を好きすぎるドSの沢村さん ; Megane-kun wo Suki Sugiru Do S no Sawamura-san ; Sadist Sawamura-san Likes Glasses-kun a Bit Too Much
description:
Description :
        This is a 4-panel web comic that depicts the sadistic boss Sawamura-san's conduct towards the bespectacled Noguchi-kun, who she's a little too overly fond of.
